name: Lojitas-Angular
summary: E-commerce mini project in Angular and Node.js as stripe back-end service
description: Lojitas is a simple ecommerce to buy any product on the website, directly supported with stripe api

name: Alura Geek
summary: A simple geek shopping using HTML, CSS and JS
description: It was a challenger for a institution scholarship

name: SportsStore
summary: SportStore is a simple store with CRUD Operations for Admin and the user can checkout
description: SportsStore is an Angular App for study purposes to creation of an app containing a website for users and administration dashboard for admins

name: Filmes-Score
summary: Simple rating movie project with React and Spring Boot
description: FilmesScore is a simple project where you can rate a movie and leave a star

name: Komodo Language
summary: Komodo is an OOP Approach custom Language, it was developed by an incredible team
description: Komodo is a language developed using ASTNodes for an exam project using Java and ANTLR Framework

name: Formula Hindi Spring
summary: Formula Hindi Spring is a challenge project using Microservices and Spring Boot concepts learned.
description: This project is a microservice application where you can simulate cars racing, and then give the summary of this race and write on the database using RabbitMQ communication

name: Scholarship
summary: Scholarship is a Back-end focused on a School with its classes
description: Scholarship deals with a class with students, 1 coordinator, 1 scrum master and many instructors with several rules on application negotiation

name: Carritos-REST
summary: Carritos is a simple project to get one car and post one car, completely for study purposes only
description: Carritos has two endpoints: one to get a car, and one to post a car, and counts with Docker Compose to run the application

name: AcademiaFitSys
summary: AcademiaFitSys is a gym app where you can manage customers, instructors and prices
description: AcademiaFitSys is a website with administration managing everything: logo, photos, misc, customers, instructors and payments. Focusing on a product for managing it

name: Minecraft JS
summary: Minecraft JS is just a simple game remade on JS based on the original one for study purposes only using React and Three.js
description: Minecraft JS has a simple gameplay where you can only move, place blocks and destroy them.
